snippet: Barry Weissler, the Tony Award-winning producer of the Broadway revival of "Chicago" and many other musicals, said on Thursday that he and his wife, Fran, along with producers Howard and Janet Kagan, had provided enhancement money to support "Pippin"...
abstract: Barry Weissler, the Tony Award-winning producer of the Broadway revival of "Chicago" and many other musicals, said on Thursday that he and his wife, Fran, along with producers Howard and Janet Kagan, had provided enhancement money to support "Pippin" at the nonprofit American Repertory.

byline.original: By PATRICK HEALY and SCOTT HELLER
